about_the_game:
Spirits of Baciu is an adventure puzzle game set in Hoia Baciu forest, one of the most mysterious and haunted places on the planet.

You will follow the adventures of The Lost One, a little spirit who suddenly wakes up in this dark forest.

How did he get here and what is haunting this place?



If you have not already had the chance, you can play the Prologue for free, which is an introductory chapter already available that will not be playable in the full game.

Compared to the Prologue, we improved the mechanics and graphics based on feedback received from players, we developed a new inventory system and added controller support!

  • Interact with your surroundings and solve numerous riddles

  • Talk to spirits and collect clues and items

  • Combine them to get new information

  • Listen to the forest and the spirits that inhabit it... the only ones who can help you!

Features:

  • New platform mechanics in addition to point-and-click mechanics, useful for solving specific puzzles

  • Hand-drawn characters and frame-by-frame animations

  • Settings based on real photos combined with illustrated parts: observing the environment is very important for finding clues and collecting items in the inventory

  • Talking to the forest dwellers will help you solve puzzles and find your way

  • Original music with nostalgic vibes will give you a more immersive experience... you’ll have to get lost to help The Lost One!

Follow us to stay updated! <3

Save the upcoming Kickstarter campaign!

name: Spirits of Baciu
short_description: Spirits of Baciu is the enigmatic adventure of a small, cat-like spirit who suddenly wakes up in the dark forest of Baciu. Help him to find his way through the woods by solving puzzles and confronting the spirits that inhabit this strange place.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian*, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
